hlpMsgVwIntro.message: The Message View dialog lets you review the links in a draft email message one at a time. The currently-selected link is highlighted in the message preview.

hlpMsgVwHowtoChg.message: If you want to change it, type in the new link address and then click Replace.

hlpMsgVwHowToNext.message: If the web address of the selected link is correct, click Next Link to review the next link in the message.

hlpMsgVwEnd.message: You can restart link checking at any time by clicking Start Over. To undo all changes, click Revert.

hlpTblVwIntro.message: The Table View dialog lets you review all the links of a draft message in a table.

hlpTblVwHowTo.message: If you want to change the address of a link, click on the table cell and then type in the new address.

hlpTblVwEnd.message: When you're done reviewing the links, click Update to apply your changes and close the dialog.

hlpLinkEg.message: Link addresses can be website URLs (for example, https://aecreations.io) or email addresses (for example, mailto:aecreations-help@groups.io).
